languages.text: "Тише, Ирлиэт, тише. Разве Пути не учат вас сдерживать мелочные страсти? Следи за собой, иначе может произойти что-то непоправимое. Снова".
"Hush, Yrliet, hush. Do the Paths not teach you to curb your petty passions? Watch yourself, or something may happen that cannot be undone. Again."
languages.original_text: "Тише, Ирлиэт, тише. Разве Пути не учат вас сдерживать мелочные страсти? Следи за собой, иначе может произойти что-то непоправимое. Снова".

traits.locale_text: "Hush, Yrliet, hush. Do the Paths not teach you to curb your petty passions? Watch yourself, or something may happen that cannot be undone. Again."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “嘘，伊莉耶特，安静点。莫非你的道途没有教导你，要克制你小小的欲望吗？当心点，否则恐怕会发生无法挽回的事情。这已经不是第一次了。”
languages.original_text: "Hush, Yrliet, hush. Do the Paths not teach you to curb your petty passions? Watch yourself, or something may happen that cannot be undone. Again."

traits.locale_text: “嘘，伊莉耶特，安静点。莫非你的道途没有教导你，要克制你小小的欲望吗？当心点，否则恐怕会发生无法挽回的事情。这已经不是第一次了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Doucement, Yrliet, chut. Les Voies ne vous enseignent-elles pas à réfréner ce genre de passion ? Prenez garde, ou il pourrait se produire quelque chose de fâcheux. Une fois de plus. »
languages.original_text: "Hush, Yrliet, hush. Do the Paths not teach you to curb your petty passions? Watch yourself, or something may happen that cannot be undone. Again."

traits.locale_text: « Doucement, Yrliet, chut. Les Voies ne vous enseignent-elles pas à réfréner ce genre de passion ? Prenez garde, ou il pourrait se produire quelque chose de fâcheux. Une fois de plus. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Calla, Yrliet, calla. ¿Acaso las Sendas no te enseñan a contener las pasiones insignificantes? Ten cuidado, no sea que suceda algo que no puedas deshacer. Otra vez».
languages.original_text: "Hush, Yrliet, hush. Do the Paths not teach you to curb your petty passions? Watch yourself, or something may happen that cannot be undone. Again."

traits.locale_text: «Calla, Yrliet, calla. ¿Acaso las Sendas no te enseñan a contener las pasiones insignificantes? Ten cuidado, no sea que suceda algo que no puedas deshacer. Otra vez».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「黙れ、ユリエット。つまらん情熱を抑える術をその道が教えてくれるのか？自重しろよ、そうでなければ取り返しのつかないことになる。性懲りのない奴め」
languages.original_text: "Hush, Yrliet, hush. Do the Paths not teach you to curb your petty passions? Watch yourself, or something may happen that cannot be undone. Again."

traits.locale_text: 「黙れ、ユリエット。つまらん情熱を抑える術をその道が教えてくれるのか？自重しろよ、そうでなければ取り返しのつかないことになる。性懲りのない奴め」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Sssch, Yrliet, sssch. Lehren die Wege Euch nicht, Eure niederen Leidenschaften zu zügeln? Haltet an Euch, sonst geschieht noch etwas, was sich nicht ungeschehen machen lässt. Erneut."
languages.original_text: "Hush, Yrliet, hush. Do the Paths not teach you to curb your petty passions? Watch yourself, or something may happen that cannot be undone. Again."

traits.locale_text: "Sssch, Yrliet, sssch. Lehren die Wege Euch nicht, Eure niederen Leidenschaften zu zügeln? Haltet an Euch, sonst geschieht noch etwas, was sich nicht ungeschehen machen lässt. Erneut."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "Hush, Yrliet, hush. Do the Paths not teach you to curb your petty passions? Watch yourself, or something may happen that cannot be undone. Again."

languages.text: "Sessiz ol Yrliet, sus. Yollar sana önemsiz tutkularını törpülemeyi öğretmedi mi? Kendine dikkat et... Yoksa telafisi olmayan şeyler yaşanabilir. Yine."
languages.original_text: "Hush, Yrliet, hush. Do the Paths not teach you to curb your petty passions? Watch yourself, or something may happen that cannot be undone. Again."

traits.locale_text: "Sessiz ol Yrliet, sus. Yollar sana önemsiz tutkularını törpülemeyi öğretmedi mi? Kendine dikkat et yoksa geri alınamayacak şeyler yaşanabilir. Yine."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
